title: Horses Digital Print Cotton Fabric by The Yard
features: Sold in one yard increments - Multiple yard orders will come in one piece; e.g. Quantity 3 will come as a 3 yard piece
description: Our high quality digital cotton fabric by the yard is soft and made so well that you'll be amazed at the quality. Finest quality Digital Printing provides extraordinary detail, clarity and endless range of colors and depth. Fabric is new off the bolt and will be delivered as one continuous piece (or can be cut at your request). We only carry well manufactured cotton, perfect for everything from quilts to clothing...
